## Attributions

Hard Hat logo by Matthew Davis from [Noun Project](https://thenounproject.com/browse/icons/term/hard-hat/).

Original [transcripts](https://www.hq.nasa.gov/alsj/a13/AS13_TEC.txt) from the Apollo 13 mission are sourced from NASA's [*Apollo 13 Lunar Surface Journal*](https://www.hq.nasa.gov/alsj/a13/a13.html).

Text sets sourced from University of North Carolina's [*Documenting the American South*](https://docsouth.unc.edu/docsouthdata/) project include The Church in the Southern Black Community, First-Person Narratives of the American South, Library of Southern Literature, and North American Slave Narratives.
